# Tables {#sec-tables}
 
```{r}
#| tbl-cap: This  is my cool caption for a gt table.
#| label: tbl-landgt
#| echo: false
#| tbl-pos: 'h!'
landings <- output |> 
  dplyr::filter(grepl("landings", label)) |>
  dplyr::select(label, year, estimate, fleet) |>
  head()

gt::gt(landings)
```

#| tbl-cap: This  is my cool caption for a kable table.
